ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kunark Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: yes, and i noticed i am hitting harder (a lot more in the 50s).  i m pretty sure it has to do with gaining a level.  although absonant binding does resist a
ygData.messageBody:
yes, and i noticed i am hitting harder (a lot more in the 50s). i'm pretty
sure it has to do with gaining a level. although absonant binding does
resist a lot more than once every 20 hours, it does stick almost all the
time which is more than i expected with 4 effects.

Shada Powa, L51 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> I have a question for all of you on Kunark...
>
> Have all of you noticed that resist rates are very very low?
> I think I've
> had one single spell resisted in the 20ish hours I've spent
> there so far.
> Am I extremely lucky or is everyone finding similar results?
>
> Anthem Dirgemaker
> Level 51 Minstrel of Qeynos
> Solusek Ro
